_a-0000eb92-18ff-8000-9d35-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_returnOoxmlCompatibleText

_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_documentProperty

_a-0000eb72-c933-8000-9d28-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_QR_getEvaluation
_a-0000eb72-c933-8000-9d28-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  aggregationFields: ri!aggregationFields,
  fields: ri!fields,
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationNumber,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationNumber
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationStatusId,
      operator: "in",
      value: {
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_SETTING_UP,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_INPROGRESS,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_AWARDEES_SELECTED,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_COMPLETE
      }
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  sort: ri!sort
)

_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_whereContains

_a-0000eb7c-0389-8000-9d2c-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_createDynamicTableForConsensusDetails_ConsensusDocument

_a-0000e643-f7f1-8000-9bca-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationFactorDocumentMapping
_a-0000e643-f7f1-8000-9bca-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_FACTOR_DOCUMENT_MAPPING,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_FactorDocumentMapping',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: and(ri!executeWhen),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "document.evalDocumentId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!documentId,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!documentId)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "factor.criteriaId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!factorIds,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!factorIds)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getActiveAndInactive = true)
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation,
  batchSize: ri!batchSize
)

_a-0000e5bc-4a9a-8000-9bbc-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_QE_getUser
_a-0000e5bc-4a9a-8000-9bbc-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_USER,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_User',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpression: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryLogicalExpression"(
    operator: "AND",
    logicalExpressions: {
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryLogicalExpression"(
        operator: "AND",
        ignoreFiltersWithEmptyValues: true,
        filters: {
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "isActive",
            operator: "=",
            value: ri!isActive,
            applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!isActive)
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "username",
            operator: "in",
            value: ri!usernames
          ),
          ri!additionalFilters
        }
      ),
      ri!logicalExpression
    }
  ),
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  sort: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(field: "firstName", ascending: true)
)

0002e734-6ed2-8000-fcb9-7f0000014e7a.name: AS GSS Generate Consensus Document

_a-0000eb7c-0389-8000-9d2c-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_BL_constructFormattedLabelValuePairText_ConsensusDocument
_a-0000eb7c-0389-8000-9d2c-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!label),
  null,
  /*Returns label in bolded Calibri font in Uppercase*/
  "<w:p>
    <w:r w:rsidDel=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidR=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidRPr=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & ">
      <w:rPr>
        <w:b w:val=" & char(34) & "1" & char(34) & "/>
        <w:rFonts w:ascii=" & char(34) & "Calibri" & char(34) & " w:cs=" & char(34) & "Calibri" & char(34) & " w:eastAsia=" & char(34) & "Calibri" & char(34) & " w:hAnsi=" & char(34) & "Calibri" & char(34) & "/>
        <w:rtl w:val=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & "/>
      </w:rPr>
      <w:t xml:space=" & char(34) & "preserve" & char(34) & ">" & upper(rule!AS_GSS_UT_returnOoxmlCompatibleText(text: ri!label)) & ":</w:t>
    </w:r>
  </w:p>" &
  /*Returns value in Times New Roman font*/
  "<w:p>
    <w:r w:rsidDel=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidR=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidRPr=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & "> 
      <w:rPr> 
        <w:rFonts w:ascii=" & char(34) & "Times New Roman" & char(34) & " w:cs=" & char(34) & "Times New Roman" & char(34) & " w:eastAsia=" & char(34) & "Times New Roman" & char(34) & " w:hAnsi=" & char(34) & "Times New Roman" & char(34) & "/> 
        <w:rtl w:val=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & "/> 
      </w:rPr> 
      <w:t xml:space=" & char(34) & "preserve" & char(34) & ">" & rule!AS_GSS_UT_returnOoxmlCompatibleText(text: ri!value) & "</w:t> 
    </w:r>
  </w:p>"
)

_a-0000eb28-f476-8000-9d09-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_BL_isConsensusReportSignaturesRequired

_a-0000e5bc-4a9a-8000-9bbc-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationDocuments
AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluation
_a-0000e5bc-4a9a-8000-9bbc-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_EVALUATION,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Evaluation',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationNumber)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationNumber",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationNumber
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationStatus.refDataId",
      operator: "in",
      value: {
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_SETTING_UP,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_INPROGRESS,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_AWARDEES_SELECTED,
        cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_COMPLETE
      }
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation,
  excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  sort: ri!sort
)

_a-0000eb16-753f-8000-9d01-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_QR_getConsensusSignatures

_a-0000ea5d-dec5-8000-9ca9-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_BL_consensusDocumentDescription

_a-0000e5da-a251-8000-9bbe-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_QE_getRatings
_a-0000e5da-a251-8000-9bbe-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_RATING,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Rating',
  returnType:ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "ratingId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!ratingId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "parentRatingId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!parentRatingId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluation.evaluationId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true()
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  sort: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(field: "sortOrder", ascending: true),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sortInfo"(field: "label", ascending: true)
  }
)

_a-0000eb1f-ba4f-8000-9d06-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_createDynamicTableForSignature_ConsensusDocument

_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_returnCdtIndicesByMultipleFields_handler
_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Integer?list',
  intersection(
    tointeger(ri!previousIndices),
    rule!AS_CO_UT_returnCdtIndicesByField(
      cdt: ri!cdt,
      field: ri!field,
      value: ri!value
    )
  )
)

d79765e3-fce4-4302-b504-c6afc7f20f74.name: AS_GSS_constructConsensusDocument
d79765e3-fce4-4302-b504-c6afc7f20f74.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!documentProperty: rule!AS_CO_UT_documentProperty(
    document: ri!consensusDocument,
    property: _
  ),
  local!consensusDoc: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument'(
    appianDocId: ri!consensusDocument,
    evaluationId: ri!consensus.evaluationId,
    consensusId: ri!consensus.consensusId,
    criteriaId: ri!consensus.factorId,
    vendorId: ri!consensus.vendorId,
    documentName: local!documentProperty("name"),
    documentDesc: local!documentProperty("description"),
    fileType: local!documentProperty("extension"),
    docType: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getRefDataByTypes(
      refDataIds: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_DOC_TYPE_CONSENSUS
    ),
    isDeleted: false,
    sourceApplication: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_R_Data'(
      refDataId: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_SOURCE_APPLICATION_GSS
    )
  ),
  rule!AS_CO_UT_captureMetadata(
    cdt: local!consensusDoc,
    modifiedBy: ri!initiator
  )
)

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_not

_a-0000e6a4-3c85-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_indexWhere

1b4b9d86-c8be-4340-978c-c4871024d5fd.name: AS_GSS_BL_sortConsensusResponsesForConsensusDocument
1b4b9d86-c8be-4340-978c-c4871024d5fd.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!activeResponses: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
    cdt: ri!consensusResponses,
    field: "isActive",
    value: true
  ),
  local!strengths: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
    cdt: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
      cdt: local!activeResponses,
      field: "responseType.refDataId",
      value: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_RESPONSE_TYPE_STRENGTH
    ),
    field: "isSignificant",
    value: false
  ),
  local!weaknesses: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
    cdt: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
      cdt: local!activeResponses,
      field: "responseType.refDataId",
      value: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_RESPONSE_TYPE_WEAKNESS
    ),
    field: "isSignificant",
    value: false
  ),
  local!defeciencies: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
    cdt: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
      cdt: local!activeResponses,
      field: "responseType.refDataId",
      value: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_RESPONSE_TYPE_DEFICIENCY
    ),
    field: "isSignificant",
    value: false
  ),
  local!significantStrengths: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
    cdt: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
      cdt: local!activeResponses,
      field: "responseType.refDataId",
      value: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_RESPONSE_TYPE_STRENGTH
    ),
    field: "isSignificant",
    value: true
  ),
  local!significantweaknesses: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
    cdt: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
      cdt: local!activeResponses,
      field: "responseType.refDataId",
      value: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_RESPONSE_TYPE_WEAKNESS
    ),
    field: "isSignificant",
    value: true
  ),
  {
    local!significantStrengths,
    local!strengths,
    local!significantweaknesses,
    local!weaknesses,
    local!defeciencies
  }
)

_a-0000eb7c-0389-8000-9d2c-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_createTableCell
_a-0000eb7c-0389-8000-9d2c-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
"<w:tc>" & 
if(
  ri!isDefaultFormattingForColumnText,
  "<w:p w:rsidR=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidDel=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidP=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidRDefault=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidRPr=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w14:paraId=" & char(34) & "00000002" & char(34) & ">
    <w:pPr>
      <w:spacing w:before=" & char(34) & "40" & char(34) & " w:line=" & char(34) & "240" & char(34) & " w:lineRule=" & char(34) & "auto" & char(34) & "/>
    </w:pPr>
    <w:r w:rsidDel=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidR=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & " w:rsidRPr=" & char(34) & "00000000" & char(34) & ">
      <w:rPr>
        <w:rFonts w:ascii=" & char(34) & "Calibri" & char(34) & " w:cs=" & char(34) & "Calibri" & char(34) & " w:eastAsia=" & char(34) & "Calibri" & char(34) & " w:hAnsi=" & char(34) & "Calibri" & char(34) & "/>
        <w:b w:val=" & char(34) & if(ri!isTextBolded, "1", "0") & char(34) & "/>
        <w:sz w:val=" & char(34) & ri!fontSize & char(34) & "/>
        <w:szCs w:val=" & char(34) & ri!fontSize & char(34) & "/>
        <w:rtl w:val=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & "/>
      </w:rPr>
      <w:t xml:space=" & char(34) & "preserve" & char(34) & ">" & rule!AS_GSS_UT_returnOoxmlCompatibleText(text: ri!column) & "</w:t>
    </w:r>
  </w:p>",
  ri!column
) & "</w:tc>"

_a-0000e721-640b-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_constructFactorDocumentMapping
_a-0000e721-640b-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!factor: rule!AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationCriteria(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_SINGLE_OBJECT,
    criteriaId: index(
      ri!evaluationDocument,
      "criteriaId",
      null
    )
  ),
  local!factorDocumentMapping: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_FactorDocumentMapping'(
    document: ri!evaluationDocument,
    factor: local!factor,
    isActive: true
  ),
  rule!AS_CO_UT_captureMetadata(
    cdt: local!factorDocumentMapping,
    modifiedBy: ri!initiator
  )
)

_a-0000e5bc-4a9a-8000-9bbc-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationVendor
_a-0000e5bc-4a9a-8000-9bbc-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_EVALUATION_VENDOR,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          a!flatten(ri!additionalFilters.value),
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!vendorId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationId)
    )
  ),
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "vendorId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!vendorId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluation.evaluationId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getActiveAndInactive = true)
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  aggregation: ri!aggregation
)

_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFields

_a-0000ea5d-dec5-8000-9ca9-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_QE_getVisibleConsensusResponses

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_indexPath
_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
with(
  local!fieldsAndIndices: rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_indexPath_nestedFieldArrayHandler(field: ri!field),

  reduce(
    index(_, _, ri!indexDefault),
    ri!cdt,
    local!fieldsAndIndices
  )
)

_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByMultipleFields

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_queryEntity

_a-0000e5bc-4a9a-8000-9bbc-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_QE_getRefDataByTypes
AS_GSS_QE_getEvaluationCriteria
_a-0000e5bc-4a9a-8000-9bbc-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_CRITERIA,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Criteria',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!additionalFilters.value),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!logicalExpression),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!aggregation),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!criteriaId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!parentCriteriaId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationId)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "criteriaId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!criteriaId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "parentCriteriaId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!parentCriteriaId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluation.evaluationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getActiveAndInactive = true)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "criteriaStatus.refDataId",
      operator: "<>",
      value: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_TEMP,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getTemp = true)
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation,
  sort: ri!sort
)

718a4c67-c1cd-48b7-9365-d276c36e8f1c.name: AS_GSS_UT_createDynamicTableForResponses_ConsensusDocument

_a-0000e438-ff39-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GAM_UT_concatUserFirstNameLastName

_a-0000ed12-1223-8000-9ddd-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_QR_getMaskEvaluatorDetails
_a-0000ed12-1223-8000-9ddd-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  recordType: recordType!AS_GSS_MaskEvaluator_SYNCEDRECORD,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  aggregationFields: ri!aggregationFields,
  fields: ri!fields,
  relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_MaskEvaluator_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS_GSS_MaskEvaluator_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
      operator: "=",
      value: true()
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  sort: ri!sort
)

_a-0000e721-640b-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_QE_getConsensusResponses

_a-0000e643-f7f1-8000-9bca-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder

_a-0000e721-640b-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_createDynamicTableHeaderRow
_a-0000e721-640b-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!tableBorderColor: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!tableBorderColor,
    default: "000000"
  ),
  local!fontSize: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!fontSize,
    default: "20"
  ),
  "<w:tbl>
  <w:tblPr>
    <w:tblStyle w:val=" & char(34) & "Table1" & char(34) & "/>
    <w:tblW w:w=" & char(34) & "14000.0" & char(34) & " w:type=" & char(34) & "dxa" & char(34) & "/>
    <w:jc w:val=" & char(34) & "left" & char(34) & "/>
    <w:tblInd w:w=" & char(34) & "100.0" & char(34) & " w:type=" & char(34) & "pct" & char(34) & "/>
    <w:tblBorders>
      <w:top w:color=" & char(34) & local!tableBorderColor & char(34) & " w:space=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "4" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & "/>
      <w:left w:color=" & char(34) & local!tableBorderColor & char(34) & " w:space=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "4" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & "/>
      <w:bottom w:color=" & char(34) & local!tableBorderColor & char(34) & " w:space=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "4" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & "/>
      <w:right w:color=" & char(34) & local!tableBorderColor & char(34) & " w:space=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "4" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & "/>
      <w:insideH w:color=" & char(34) & local!tableBorderColor & char(34) & " w:space=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "4" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & "/>
      <w:insideV w:color=" & char(34) & local!tableBorderColor & char(34) & " w:space=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "4" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & "/>
    </w:tblBorders>
    <w:tblLayout w:type=" & char(34) & "fixed" & char(34) & "/>
    <w:tblLook w:val=" & char(34) & "0600" & char(34) & "/>
  </w:tblPr>
  <w:tblGrid>" &
  concat(
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      ri!headers,
      "<w:gridCol w:w=" & char(34) & "4500" & char(34) & "/>"
    )
  )
  & "</w:tblGrid>
  <w:tr>
    <w:trPr>
      <w:cantSplit w:val=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & "/>
      <w:tblHeader w:val=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & "/>
      <w:trHeight w:hRule=" & char(34) & "exact" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "300" & char(34) & " />
    </w:trPr>" &
    concat(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        ri!headers,
        rule!AS_GSS_UT_createTableCell(
          column: fv!item,
          fontSize: local!fontSize,
          isDefaultFormattingForColumnText: true,
          isTextBolded: true
        )
      )
    ) &
    "</w:tr>
  </w:tbl>"
)

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_returnCdtIndicesByMultipleFields
_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Integer?list',
  reduce(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_zINTERNAL_returnCdtIndicesByMultipleFields_handler(
      previousIndices: _,
      cdt: ri!cdt,
      field: _,
      value: _
    ),
    rule!AS_CO_UT_enumForCount(ri!cdt),
    merge(
      a!flatten(ri!fields),
      a!flatten(ri!values)
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_captureMetadata

_a-0000eb1f-ba4f-8000-9d06-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_CO_UT_formatDateTimeTextWithTimezone

_a-0000ea5d-dec5-8000-9ca9-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_filterVisibleConsensusResponses

_a-0000e714-224b-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_QE_getConsensusReport
_a-0000e714-224b-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*Note: This rule cannot have assertions*/
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  entity: cons!AS_GSS_ENT_CONSENSUS_REPORT,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS}AS_GSS_Consensus_Report',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  excludeNestedCdts: ri!excludeNestedCdts,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!consensusId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!factorId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!vendorId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!status),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!evaluationid)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "consensusId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!consensusId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "consensusId",
      operator: "not in",
      value: ri!excludeConsensusId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "factorId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!factorId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "vendorId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!vendorId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "status.refDataId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!status
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "evaluationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!evaluationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applywhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(ri!getActiveAndInactive = true)
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isArchived",
      operator: "in",
      value: a!defaultValue(
        value: ri!isArchived,
        default: {false}
      )
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation,
  sort: ri!sort,
  batchSize: ri!batchSize
)

_a-0000e6c8-d132-8000-9bbe-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_queryRecord

_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_returnCdtIndicesByField
_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
cast(
   'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Integer?list',
  rule!AS_CO_UT_whereContains(
    values: ri!value,
    array: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
      cdt: a!flatten(ri!cdt),
      field: ri!field,
      indexDefault: null
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField

e3b8727d-02a2-4ad8-868e-38b80ffcaa48.name: AS_GSS_UT_createTableRowWithDynamicColumns
e3b8727d-02a2-4ad8-868e-38b80ffcaa48.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!tableBorderColor: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!tableBorderColor,
    default: "000000"
  ),
  local!fontSize: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!fontSize,
    default: "20"
  ),
  local!tableAlignment: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!tableAlignment,
    default: "left"
  ),
  local!tableWidth: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!tableWidth,
    default: "14000.0"
  ),
  local!tableColumnWidth: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!tableColumnWidth,
    default: "4500"
  ),
  local!isDefaultFormattingForColumnText: a!defaultValue(
    ri!isDefaultFormattingForColumnText, 
    true
  ),
  "<w:tbl>
  <w:tblPr>
    <w:tblStyle w:val=" & char(34) & "Table1" & char(34) & "/>
    <w:tblW w:w=" & char(34) & local!tableWidth & char(34) & " w:type=" & char(34) & "dxa" & char(34) & "/>
    <w:jc w:val=" & char(34) & local!tableAlignment & char(34) & "/>
    <w:tblInd w:w=" & char(34) & "100.0" & char(34) & " w:type=" & char(34) & "pct" & char(34) & "/>
    <w:tblBorders>
      <w:top w:color=" & char(34) & local!tableBorderColor & char(34) & " w:space=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "8" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & "/>
      <w:left w:color=" & char(34) & local!tableBorderColor & char(34) & " w:space=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "8" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & "/>
      <w:bottom w:color=" & char(34) & local!tableBorderColor & char(34) & " w:space=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "8" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & "/>
      <w:right w:color=" & char(34) & local!tableBorderColor & char(34) & " w:space=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "8" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & "/>
      <w:insideH w:color=" & char(34) & local!tableBorderColor & char(34) & " w:space=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "8" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & "/>
      <w:insideV w:color=" & char(34) & local!tableBorderColor & char(34) & " w:space=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & " w:sz=" & char(34) & "8" & char(34) & " w:val=" & char(34) & "single" & char(34) & "/>
    </w:tblBorders>
    <w:tblLayout w:type=" & char(34) & "fixed" & char(34) & "/>
    <w:tblLook w:val=" & char(34) & "0600" & char(34) & "/>
  </w:tblPr>
  <w:tblGrid>" &
  concat(
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      ri!cells,
      "<w:gridCol w:w=" & char(34) & local!tableColumnWidth & char(34) & "/>"
    )
  )
  & "</w:tblGrid>
  <w:tr>
    <w:trPr>
      <w:cantSplit w:val=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & "/>
      <w:tblHeader w:val=" & char(34) & "0" & char(34) & "/>
    </w:trPr>" &
    concat(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        ri!cells,
        rule!AS_GSS_UT_createTableCell(
          column: fv!item,
          fontSize: local!fontSize,
          isDefaultFormattingForColumnText: local!isDefaultFormattingForColumnText
        )
      )
    )
  & "</w:tr>
  </w:tbl>"
)

_a-0000e61a-f20f-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GAM_CO_I18N_UT_displayLabel
